messages.message: Anyone have a UDF that can combine the results of multiple Refiner programs? For instance, if you Flow is setup to be `Process Files` --> `Map Record` --> `Apply Refiner` --> `Apply Refiner` --> `Merge`
If you put two refiner programs in the same folder, and use the Extra Settings in the Apply Refiner step — i believe you’ll get what you want here
two Apply Refiner steps one after another i dont think does what you want here
Ah I see, I’ll try out that option. Yeah my plan was to make a UDF which would let me retrieve the results of two previous steps
The documentation doesnt say much about this feature, what exactly happens when running multiple .ibprogs together? Do their outputs simply get combined?
